@DinisCruz @sec_tigger @Netlify Read access or admin access? I believe that Github API rather course-grained permissions mean that Netlify needs more than just read access. (it manages things like webhooks and deploy keys for you) More info here, https://t.co/xNIhVkbPH9 (or via support in the Netlify admin)
